name: Isabella "Inkskin" Locke

specials.name: Blood Magic
specials.description: Elemental energy surrounds her. Either gain a +1 status bonus to Intimidation checks for 1 round, or a target takes 1 bludgeoning damage per spell level. If the spell already deals bludgeoning damage, combine it with the spell’s initial damage before determining weaknesses and resistances.

specials.name: Moto Tattoo
specials.description: Moto is a tattoo familiar and can spend two actions to transform from a sea snake (lv0 sea snake, PB2 p.245) to a tattoo on Isabella while touching her, or transform from a tattoo to a sea snake that appears within 5 feet of Isabella.

description: Isabella is an agent of the sea devils found in Mancatcher Cove. Her familiar, Moto, is often found as a tattoo on her, rarely making itself known. --- Brine's Sting / Item 6 Magical / Necromancy Price 240 gp Usage held in 1 hand Bulk 1 This +1 striking rapier is slim with a hilt guard in the shape of a writhing purple sea snake. On a critical hit, the target must succeed at a Fortitude save against your class DC or be sickened 1 until the end of your next turn as salty brine drips into the wound. This is in addition to the weapon's normal critical specialization effect.
